heif.boxes

Class ItemPropertyAssociationBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.ItemPropertyAssociationBox

  • public class ItemPropertyAssociationBox
extends FullBox
    Represents the ipma (Item Property Association Box) in HEIF/ISOBMFF files.

    The ipma box defines associations between items and their properties. Each item can reference multiple properties, and each property can be marked as essential or non-essential for decoding the item.

    This class supports both version 0 and version 1 of the ipma box format. The structure is specified in the ISO/IEC 23008-12:2017 (HEIF) on Page 28 document.

    API Note: Further testing may be required to validate the reliability and robustness of this implementation.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Method Detail

      • getEntryCount

        public int getEntryCount()
        Returns the total number of items that have property associations in this box.
        Returns:
        the number of entries in the ipma box

      • getItemIDAt

        public int getItemIDAt(int index)
        Retrieves the item ID for the entry at the specified array index.

        Note: This refers to the index within the entries array, not the item_ID itself.

        Parameters:
        index - the 0-based index of the entry to retrieve
        Returns:
        the unique identifier of the item (image or metadata)
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range

      • getAssociationCountAt

        public int getAssociationCountAt(int index)
        Retrieves the number of property associations defined for the entry at the specified array index.
        Parameters:
        index - the 0-based index of the entry to retrieve
        Returns:
        the count of properties associated with the item at this index
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range

      • findEntry

        public ItemPropertyAssociationBox.ItemPropertyEntry findEntry(int itemID)
        Retrieves the full associations for a specific item ID.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the ID of the item
        Returns:
        the entry containing all associations, or null if not found

      • getPropertyIndicesArray

        public int[] getPropertyIndicesArray(int itemID)
        Retrieves the 1-based property indices associated with the specified item ID.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the unique identifier of the image or metadata item
        Returns:
        an array of 1-based indices into the property container, or an empty array if no associations exist for the given ID

      • isPropertyEssential

        public boolean isPropertyEssential(int itemID,
                                   int propertyIndex)
        Checks if a specific property association for an item is marked as essential.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the ID of the item
        propertyIndex - the 1-based index of the property
        Returns:
        true if the association exists and is marked essential, false otherwise

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs the box hierarchy and internal entry data at the debug level.

        It provides a visual representation of the box's HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure. It is intended for tree traversal and file inspection during development and degugging if required.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class FullBox
